title: The Origins and Significance of "Identity Economics"
itunes:title: The Origins and Significance of "Identity Economics"
description: Nobel laureate George Akerlof and Duke University economist Rachel Kranton talk about their book, Identity Economics and the insights that the concept continues to provide for economic analysis.
content:encoded: Nobel laureate George Akerlof and Duke University economist Rachel Kranton talk about their book, Identity Economics and the insights that the concept continues to provide for economic analysis.

itunes:author: Institute for New Economic Thinking (INET)
